timeline.bodyText: I've noticed that you have removed instead of moved this module.. was that intentionally? Why?
timeline.author: vorburger
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -108,16 +113,8 @@
       
         <module name="SuppressWarningsHolder" />
         <module name="OuterTypeFilename"/>
-        <module name="IllegalTokenText">
-            <property name="tokens" value="STRING_LITERAL, CHAR_LITERAL"/>
-            <property name="format" value="\\u00(08|09|0(a|A)|0(c|C)|0(d|D)|22|27|5(C|c))|\\(0(10|11|12|14|15|42|47)|134)"/>
-            <property name="message" value="Avoid using corresponding octal or Unicode escape."/>
-        </module>
-        <module name="AvoidEscapedUnicodeCharacters">

replies.bodyText: This happened because I tested both of them simultaneously, but later followed our rule of one checkstyle per PR(And second PR for the other followed this one). It is unintentional :)
replies.author: thesmallstar

replies.bodyText: @thesmallstar OK, then rebase and fix this?
replies.author: vorburger
